We went there early at 5pm on a Sunday so there was ample seating.  We were called over by the owner to sit at the bar where one can see all the different tapas that can be ordered.  Service was excellent. The owner and staff was very friendly.   The food were fresh. The shrimp skewers were cooked perfectly.  Definitely the best tapas I have ever had so far.  If you are in Barcelona this is a must east restaurant especially for tapas.
